%
\pgfplotsset{
    label style={font=\footnotesize},
    tick label style={font=\footnotesize}, 
    title style={font=\footnotesize, yshift=-1.2ex},
    ylabel shift=-1ex,
    xlabel shift=-0.8ex,
    % show left axis mark 
    axis lines*=left,
    grid=major,
    grid style={line width=.1pt, draw=gray!20},
    % define
    legend style={
        font = \scriptsize,
        fill = white!90, 
        draw opacity = 1,
        text opacity = 1,
        very thin,
        legend columns = 3,
        draw=none, % remove legend border
    },
    compat=newest}
%
